content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) with the current status of WORKING and a fuel inventory containing coal. It processes iron ore to produce iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors with furnace ingredient management
- Ensure that the furnace has the necessary ingredients before attempting to insert more. Monitor the status of the furnace to avoid inserting items when it is already full or has no ingredients.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
